data.name: ROI Basics
data.text: ROI measures the return on an investment relative to the cost of the investment. When investing in the stock market, it's important to consider both short-term and long-term ROI.

questions.text: What should you consider when investing in the stock market?
What is a good ROI for an investment?

data.name: Maximizing ROI
data.text: Maximizing ROI in the stock market requires balancing risk and reward. Diversifying your portfolio can help reduce risk and increase overall ROI. Researching potential investments is also key to maximizing ROI.

questions.text: What is required to maximize ROI in the stock market?
How can diversifying your portfolio help maximize ROI?

answers.text: Reduces risk and increases overall ROI
Increases risk and decreases overall ROI

questions.text: What is key to maximizing ROI in the stock market?
